thread.title: Federal authorities in Arizona seize some $1.3M in marijuana found in a bell pepper shipment
thread.title_full: Federal authorities in Arizona seize some $1.3M in marijuana found in a bell pepper shipment

title: Federal authorities in Arizona seize some $1.3M in marijuana found in a bell pepper shipment
text:
Federal authorities in Arizona seize some $1.3M in marijuana found in a bell pepper shipment   
NOGALES, Ariz. â€“ Federal authorities at the Arizona border in Nogales say more than $1.3 million worth of marijuana has been found in a shipment of bell peppers. 
U.S. Customs and Border Protection officers at the Mariposa commercial facility conducted a secondary inspection after a drug-sniffing dog alerted to a tractor-trailer. 
The officers located more than 2,700 pounds of marijuana in the truck's load of bell peppers. 
The driver was arrested, and authorities say he's a 38-year-old man from Nogales, Sonora, Mexico. 
Officers processed the drugs and vehicle and referred the man to U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement's Homeland Security Investigations. Advertisement
